readable.title: 2113530024_5bc6a90e42
readable.content: A goalie tries to catch a ball during a soccer game . A group of guys playing soccer on a field . Footballers are scrambling around the goal as the goal keeper reaches for the ball . Four men in green at a soccer goal post trying to score , while 3 men in blue try to prevent it . Two soccer teams converge at the goal and the goalie reaches for the ball .
